Uses of Class
environment.model.Station

  • Packages that use Station 
    Package Description
    environment
    This module contains the model and the different views for the Petrol Station Simulation.
    environment.GUI
    This module contains all the classes necessary for the graphical user interfaces.
    environment.GUI.views
    This module contains all the classes necessary for displaying the results of the simulation to the user.
    environment.model
    This module contains all the classes necessary for modelling the simulation of a petrol station.

    • Uses of Station in environment

      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      The Station which is the object of the simulation.
      Fields in environment with type parameters of type Station 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private SimulatorView<Station> Simulator.view
      The SimulatorView that will be used to display the results of the simulation to the user.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SimulatorView<Station> UserInterface.getView()
      Handles the view setting chosen by the user sent from the UserInterface nulls the current view and then sets view to be in accordance with the new value.
